name: GratomicInc
0:
”Alexa, open gratomic inc.”
”Alexa, tell gratomic inc play the latest episode.”
”Alexa, tell gratomic inc browse recent episodes.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gratomic inc
des: Gratomic is a leader in the mining and commercialization of graphite products – specifically the valuable graphene-based nano material that can be used for a wide range of mass market elastomer and polymer products, including the US $222 billion* global tire market. We are also aggressively developing other industrial applications such as lubricants, special rust, and proof coatings. Existing mine infrastructure (open pit and adits) allows for rapid restart of operations. The company has an existing production facility in Namibia.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
